name: 3BallMTY
description: '''3BallMTY''' (pronounced "'''Tribal [[Monterrey]]'''") is a Mexican pop DJ group from the city of [[Monterrey, Nuevo León]], Mexico. The "DJ Collective" (the name its members have formally given themselves) was formed in 2009 by two teenage DJs – Sergio Zavala (DJ Sheeqo Beat), and Alberto Presenda (DJ Otto). The name "3Ball" comes from the Spanish word "tribal", which refers to the culture of [[Trival|guaracha tribal music]] popular in many Spanish-speaking countries around the world.
